text: Ms. 45 (also known as Angel of Vengeance, and mistyped as Ms. 45) is a 1981 American crime thriller movie directed by Abel Ferrara (wlo also stars) and starring Zoe Lund, Editta Sherman, Albert Sinkys. It was distributed by Rochelle Films. ==Other websites== * * Category:1981 crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Abel Ferrara Category:American independent movies
title: Ms. 45
